pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā cetiyesu cārikaṃ caramāno yena bhaddavatikā tena pāyāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.2: Addasaṃsu kho gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.3: Disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—“mā kho, bhante, bhagavā ambatitthaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.4: Ambatitthe, bhante, jaṭilassa assame nāgo paṭivasati iddhimā āsiviso ghoraviso.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.8: tatiyampi kho gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.10: Ambatitthe, bhante, jaṭilassa assame nāgo paṭivasati iddhimā āsiviso ghoraviso.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.13: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena bhaddavatikā tadavasari. Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā bhaddavatikāyaṃ viharati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.14: Atha kho āyasmā sāgato yena ambatitthassa jaṭilassa assamo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā agyāgāraṃ pavisitvā tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññapetvā nisīdi pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.15: Addasā kho so nāgo āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ paviṭṭhaṃ. Disvāna dummano padhūpāyi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.17: Atha kho so nāgo makkhaṃ asahamāno pajjali.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.19: Atha kho āyasmā sāgato tassa nāgassa tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyitvā yena bhaddavatikā tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.20: Atha kho bhagavā bhaddavatikāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena kosambī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.21: Assosuṃ kho kosambikā upāsakā—“ayyo kira sāgato ambatitthikena nāgena saddhiṃ saṅgāmesī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.22: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena kosambī tadavasari. Atha kho kosambikā upāsakā bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ karitvā yenāyasmā sāgato tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.23: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho kosambikā upāsakā āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.24: “kiṃ, bhante, ayyānaṃ dullabhañca manāpañca, kiṃ paṭiyādemā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.25: Evaṃ vutte, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kosambike upāsake etadavocuṃ—“atthāvuso, kāpotikā nāma pasannā bhikkhūnaṃ dullabhā ca manāpā ca, taṃ paṭiyādethā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.26: Atha kho kosambikā upāsakā ghare ghare kāpotikaṃ pasannaṃ paṭiyādetvā āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ disvāna āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ etadavocuṃ—“pivatu, bhante, ayyo sāgato kāpotikaṃ pasannaṃ, pivatu, bhante, ayyo sāgato kāpotikaṃ pasannan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.27: Atha kho āyasmā sāgato ghare ghare kāpotikaṃ pasannaṃ pivitvā nagaramhā nikkhamanto nagaradvāre paripati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.28: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nagaramhā nikkhamanto addasa āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ nagaradvāre paripatantaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.30: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ ārāmaṃ netvā yena bhagavā tena sīsaṃ katvā nipātesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.31: Atha kho āyasmā sāgato parivattitvā yena bhagavā tena pāde karitvā seyyaṃ kappesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.32: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi—“nanu, bhikkhave, pubbe sāgato tathāgate sagāravo ahosi sappatisso”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.34: “Api nu kho, bhikkhave, sāgato etarahi tathāgate sagāravo sappatisso”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.36: “Nanu, bhikkhave, sāgato ambatitthikena nāgena saddhiṃ saṅgāmesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.38: “Api nu kho, bhikkhave, sāgato etarahi pahoti nāgena saddhiṃ saṅgāmetun”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.40: “Api nu kho, bhikkhave, taṃ pātabbaṃ yaṃ pivitvā visaññī assā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.42: “Ananucchavikaṃ, bhikkhave, sāgatassa ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.43: Kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, sāgato majjaṃ pivissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.45: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:2.3.2: amajjañca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati,
